item.description:
Building Democracy >From Below



Taking our future into our own hands…

Noam Chomsky- Professor Emeritus MIT

Steve Meacham- City Life / Vida Urbana

Marilyn Levin- National Assembly to End the Iraq and Afghanistan

Wars and occupations



Popular movements in the U.S.– Past and Present

Must we wait for others or should we do it ourselves?

Tuesday, September 29, 6:00 PM

Room 26-100

Massachusetts Institute of Technology

www.stopthewars.org

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: 9/29 6pm Forum w/ Noam Chomsky @ MIT room 26-100
